Package com.github.nwillc.opa

Interface Dao<K,T extends HasKey<K>>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of the key for the persisted type
    T - the type being persisted
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachingDao, JdbcDao, MemoryBackedDao, MongoDbDao

    public interface Dao<K,T extends HasKey<K>>
    A simplistic data access object interface. Supporting create/update, deletion and retrieval with query criteria.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void delete​(K key)
      Delete an based on its key.
      default void delete​(K key, Transaction transaction)
      Delete entity in a transaction which can be rolled back.
      java.util.stream.Stream<T> find​(Query<T> query)
      Find the objects matching a query.
      java.util.stream.Stream<T> findAll​()
      Return a stream of the objects
      java.util.Optional<T> findOne​(K key)
      Find an object based on the key.
      void save​(T entity)
      Save the object, create it or update if it exists.
      default void save​(T entity, Transaction transaction)
      Save entity in a transaction which can be rolled back.
